content: the size s only kfb in one stitch only 45 50 st pattern row round 1-3 k4 p1 around round 4 k4 pbf around 54 60 sts round 5 c4l p2 around round 1a-4a k4 p2 around repeat rnds 1a-4a round 5 two three or more for longer cuff write down what you did so you can mimic it on the other sock more times then rnds 1a-3a one time then work round 1b k4 p2tog around heel flap row a k7 9 kfb or increase in next st k1 turn row b sl 1 p19 23 you ll be borrowing from other needles turn slip remaining st on needle to top of foot needle if you like you can put the top of the foot stitches on two needles but they are counted as needle 2 as a unit entwined house socks for ladies page 2 if you are working on circular needles just slip all the stitches you aren t using for the heel on the second cable and keep the heel stitches on one cable you ll be working back and forth on these stitches only that is best accomplished by sliding the stitches you want to move onto a dpn or cable needle first working on 20 24 st back and forth continue as follows row 1 sl 1 kw k1 x 10 12 turn row 2 sl 1 pw p19 23 repeat row 1 and 2-- 8 10 more times heel cup row 1 sl 1 kw k11 13 ssk k1 turn row 2 sl 1 pw p5 p2tog p1 turn row 3 sl 1 kw k6 ssk k1 turn row 4 sl 1 pw p7 p2tog p1 turn continue row 3 and 4 working one st further along each row until all stitches are used up and right side is facing last 2 row will simply have ssk at the k end p2tog at p end 12 14 st picking up stitches for ankle using circulars cable 1 k across 6 7 heel cup stitches place marker marked as bor beginning of round k across remainder of heel cups stitches pick up and knit 10 12 stitches from the flap side facing pick up and knit one stitch in the corner if you end out with a stitch or two more it doesn t matter in the least you will simply decrease them out as you work along the next section in fact if you think you have too big a gap then pick up an extra stitch at the end of the chains cable 2 work in pattern across top of foot stitches size s p1 k4 x 5 p1 size m/l k3 p1 k4 x 4 k3 continue with cable 2 pick up one stitch in corner then pick up and knit 10 12 stitches from side of heel flap facing transfer the 11 13 stitches to spare i used the cable needle needle and then to hanging end of other cable
